languages.text: "То есть вместо того, чтобы искоренить грех Теодоры, ты перенял его по наследству?" {n}Голос Сестры битвы звенит праведной сталью.{/n}
"So instead of eradicating Theodora's misdeeds, you chose to inherit them?" {n}Argenta's voice rings with righteous steel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "То есть вместо того, чтобы искоренить грех Теодоры, ты перенял его по наследству?" {n}Голос Сестры битвы звенит праведной сталью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So instead of banishing Theodora's offence, you have inherited it?" {n}The voice of the Sister of Battle rings with the righteous steel.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So instead of banishing Theodora's offence, you have inherited it?" {n}The voice of the Sister of Battle rings with the righteous steel.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So instead of eradicating Theodora's offence, you have inherited it, right?" {n}The voice of the Sister of Battle rings with the righteous steel.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So instead of eradicating Theodora's offence, you have inherited it, right?" {n}The voice of the Sister of Battle rings with the righteous steel.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So instead of eradicating Theodora's misdeeds, you chose to inherit them?" {n}Argenta's voice rings with righteous steel.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So instead of eradicating Theodora's misdeeds, you chose to inherit them?" {n}Argenta's voice rings with righteous steel.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Alors, au lieu de corriger les méfaits de Théodora, vous avez choisi d'en hériter ? » {n}demande Argenta d'une voix tranchante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So instead of eradicating Theodora's misdeeds, you chose to inherit them?" {n}Argenta's voice rings with righteous steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Alors, au lieu d'effacer le crime de Théodora, vous en avez hérité, c'est bien ça ? » {n}demande la Sœur de Bataille d'une voix tranchante.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¿De modo que, en lugar de erradicar los errores de Theodora, decidió heredarlos?». {n}La voz de Argenta tiene el filo del acero justo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So instead of eradicating Theodora's misdeeds, you chose to inherit them?" {n}Argenta's voice rings with righteous steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «De modo que en lugar de erradicar la ofensa de Theodora, la ha heredado. ¿No es así?». {n}La voz de la Hermana de Batalla resuena con el tono acerado de la justicia.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “也就是说，你并没有消灭西奥多拉犯下的罪过，而是在罪恶的道路上继续前进，是吗？”{n}阿洁塔的声音带着钢铁般的正义决心。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So instead of eradicating Theodora's misdeeds, you chose to inherit them?" {n}Argenta's voice rings with righteous steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “所以，你并没有消灭西奥多拉犯下的罪过，而是在罪恶的道路上继续前进，对吗？”{n}战斗修女的声音响了起来，带着钢铁般的正义决心。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Anstatt Theodoras Missetaten auszulöschen, habt Ihr also entschieden, sie zu erben?" {n}Argentas Stimme klingt wie eine rechtschaffene Klinge.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So instead of eradicating Theodora's misdeeds, you chose to inherit them?" {n}Argenta's voice rings with righteous steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Statt Theodoras Vergehen also auszulöschen, habt Ihr es geerbt, richtig?" {n}Die Stimme der Schwester der Schlacht klingt wie eine rechtschaffene Klinge.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「では、シオドーラの不正を根絶するのではなく、それを受け継ぐ道を選んだのだな？」{n}アルジェンタの声は、正義の鋼の如く響いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "So instead of eradicating Theodora's misdeeds, you chose to inherit them?" {n}Argenta's voice rings with righteous steel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「では、シオドーラの不正を根絶するのではなく、それを受け継ぐ道を選んだのだな？」{n}アルジェンタの声は、正義の鋼の如く響いた。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Theodora'nın hatalarını ortadan kaldırmak yerine onları üzerine almayı mı tercih ettin?" {n}Argenta'nın sesi, erdemli bir sinirle çınlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "So instead of eradicating Theodora's misdeeds, you chose to inherit them?" {n}Argenta's voice rings with righteous steel.{/n}
